sentences.en: Are you the gazelle or the lion?
sentences.cn: 不管你是狮子还是瞪羚.

sentences.en: Maybe he was more like a leopard than a gazelle.
sentences.cn: 也许他更像豹而不像羚羊.

sentences.en: She was very beautiful -- with hair of snowy white -- and as graceful a gazelle.
sentences.cn: 她非常非常地美丽 — 有着一头雪白色的长发 --- 并且身体像瞪羚一样优雅.

sentences.en: The lioness bounded across the plain, hard on the heels of a terrified gazelle.
sentences.cn: 母狮在平原上跳跃着, 紧紧地跟在惊恐的小羚羊后面.

sentences.en: The story I wish to tell is the story of me and this gazelle.
sentences.cn: 我要说的是我和这只羚羊的故事.

sentences.en: Their faces were the faces of lions as swift as gazelle s in the mountains.
sentences.cn: 他们的面貌好像狮子,快跑如同山上的鹿.

sentences.en: Typical desert animals are the gazelle, the fox, and the hare.
sentences.cn: 常见的沙漠动物有瞪羚 、 狐狸和野兔.

sentences.en: Whether you are a lion or a gazelle, You must sprint for survival.
sentences.cn: 无论是狮子还是羚羊, 都必须为生存而奔跑.

sentences.en: Whether you choose to be a gazelle or a lion is of no consequence.
sentences.cn: 无论你选择做一只瞪羚或者一只狮子都是不重要的.

sentences.en: Your breasts are like two fawns, twins of a gazelle.
sentences.cn: 你的两乳好像一对小鹿 、 就是母鹿双生的.

sentences.en: Your two breasts are like fawns , like fawns of a gazelle that browse among the lilies.
sentences.cn: 你的两乳好像百合花中吃草的一对小鹿,就是母鹿双生的.

sentences.en: Your two breasts are like two fawns , like twin fawns of a gazelle that browse lilies.
sentences.cn: 你的两乳 、 好像百合花中吃草的一对小鹿、就是母鹿双生的.

sentences.en: Your two breasts are like two fawns, Twins of a gazelle Which feed among the lilies.
sentences.cn: 歌4:5你的两乳 、 好像百合花中吃草的一对小鹿、就是母鹿双生的.

sentences.en: Your two breasts are like two fawns, Twins of a gazelle, That feed among the lilies.
sentences.cn: 5你的两乳好像百合花中吃草的一对小羚羊, 就是母羚羊双生的.

sentences.en: Your two breasts are like two fawns, Twins of a gazelle.
sentences.cn: 3你的两乳好像一对小羚羊,就是母羚羊双生的.

trans.tran_en: a type of small deer, which jumps very gracefully and has large beautiful eyes
